name: Turn the Tables
text: Winner of best presentation: This project is like a reverse Yelp, where business can review their customers. Features business and guest accounts and ability to post reviews and rate guests.

name: Employee Directory
text: A simple react app to view a list of employees and filter by first name. Also includes a useable search bar

name: Budgeting App
text: Cool app that allows you to input a dollar value and will graph out your withdrawls and deposits

name: ReadMe Generator
text: A help readme generator through node that builds a readme based on a set of loaded questions

name: Team Generator
text: an application that allows you to input selected users and outputs an html with the members and positions

name: Note Taker App
text: online app that allows you take notes and store them via a database
